Question: BANF CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
BANF

Product: Smart tire iSensor

- Awarded the 2024 CES Innovation Award in the Vehicle Tech and Advanced Mobility category
- Features wireless charging and communication, a 3-axis accelerometer sensor, and an AI adaptive algorithm
- Provides real-time tire data, tire tread measurements, road condition insights, wheel alignment optimization, and detection of loose lug nuts conditions
- Presented at CES 2024, showcasing revolutionary next-generation smart tire technology
- Aims to strengthen global presence and lead the next-generation mobility sector through strategic partnerships both domestically and internationally
